Package ohos.agp.render.render3d.util

Interface MeshBuilder


  • public interface MeshBuilder
    A utility class for creating 3D mesh resources from raw data.

    You can pass a MeshBuilder object to ResourceManager to create a mesh resource.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  MeshBuilder.Primitive
      Represents the primitive used to build a mesh.
      static class  MeshBuilder.VertexData
      Provides the vertex data for creating a mesh.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addPrimitive​(MeshBuilder.Primitive primitive)
      Adds a primitive and related information to the current mesh.
      void allocate​()
      Allocates memory for the current mesh.
      int getIndexCount​()
      Obtains the index count.
      int getVertexCount​()
      Obtains the vertex count.
      void release​()
      Releases the current mesh.
      void setAabb​(int primitiveIndex, BoundingBox bounds)
      Sets an axis-aligned bounding box (AABB) for a primitive.
      void setIndexData​(int primitiveIndex, ByteBuffer indices)
      Sets indices to triangles for a primitive.
      void setVertexData​(int primitiveIndex, MeshBuilder.VertexData vertexData)
      Sets geometry data for a given primitive.

    • Method Detail

      • allocate

        void allocate​()
        Allocates memory for the current mesh.

        This method should be called after all primitives have been added to this mesh and before data is being fed to primitives.

      • release

        void release​()
        Releases the current mesh.

      • addPrimitive

        void addPrimitive​(MeshBuilder.Primitive primitive)
        Adds a primitive and related information to the current mesh.
        Parameters:
        primitive - Indicates the primitive to add and the related information that determines memory requirements.

      • setVertexData

        void setVertexData​(int primitiveIndex,
                   MeshBuilder.VertexData vertexData)
        Sets geometry data for a given primitive.
        Parameters:
        primitiveIndex - Indicates the index of the primitive.
        vertexData - Indicates the data buffers for creating a mesh.

      • setIndexData

        void setIndexData​(int primitiveIndex,
                  ByteBuffer indices)
        Sets indices to triangles for a primitive.
        Parameters:
        primitiveIndex - Indicates the index of the primitive.
        indices - Indicates index data as a byte array (the format of which is defined by the information related to the primitive).

      • setAabb

        void setAabb​(int primitiveIndex,
             BoundingBox bounds)
        Sets an axis-aligned bounding box (AABB) for a primitive.
        Parameters:
        primitiveIndex - Indicates the index of the primitive.
        bounds - Indicates the primitive bounds.

      • getVertexCount

        int getVertexCount​()
        Obtains the vertex count.

        This method should be called after allocate() has been called.

        Returns:
        Returns the total vertex count in the current mesh.

      • getIndexCount

        int getIndexCount​()
        Obtains the index count.

        16-bit indices are packed (two per one 32-bit slot), and there might be paddings involved.

        Returns:
        Returns the total index count in the current mesh.
